Package Control

Class TicketPrice_Controller

java.lang.Object
Control.TicketPrice_Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TicketPrice_Controller extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an instance of a ticket price controller used in the system. Which will control the calculation of ticket pricing in the application.
See Also:

    Constructor for the TicketPrice_Controller, where it will populate the ticketpricemap with the default values.

      public void setTicketPriceMap(HashMap<Entity.PriceAdjust,Double> ticketPriceMap)
      This method sets the TicketPriceMap to a new HashMap
      Parameters:
      ticketPriceMap - is the new HashMap

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice(Entity.PriceAdjust key)
      This method is used to get the price of a specific priceAdjust object in the TicketPriceMap
      Parameters:
      key - the specific priceAdjust object.
      Returns:
      Double value of the priceAdjust key, if the key doesn't exist return 0.00

    • addTicketPriceItem

      public void addTicketPriceItem(Entity.PriceAdjust newKey, double price)
      This method is used to add a new key value pair to the TicketPriceMap.
      Parameters:
      newKey - The new priceAdjust key to be added into the hash table.
      price - The value of the priceAdjust key to be added into the hash table.

    • updateTicketPriceItem

      public void updateTicketPriceItem(Entity.PriceAdjust key, double newprice)
      This method is used to update the ticket price.
      Parameters:
      key - The priceAdjust key that is to be updated.
      newprice - The value of the price that is to be updated into the hash table.

    • removeTicketPriceItem

      public void removeTicketPriceItem(Entity.PriceAdjust key)
      This method is used to remove a PriceAdjust key from the hashmap.
      Parameters:
      key - priceAdjust object.

    • calcPrice

      public double calcPrice(Entity.Constants.MOVIE_TYPE movieType, Entity.Constants.TICKET_TYPE ticketType, Entity.Constants.CINEMA_TYPE cinemaType)
      This method calculates the total price of the ticket based on the TicketType and Movie Type.
      Parameters:
      movieType - The Type of the movie.
      ticketType - The type of the ticket.
      cinemaType - The type of the cinema.
      Returns:
      the calculated price of the movie.
